testcase.name: Add multiple products to wishlist, select one product from wishlist and add it to cart.
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to website...................................................passed And Navigate to search section and search for mobiles.......................passed And Select the specific mobile, capture the Name of the product as displayed on UI.passed And Check for the Size Name and colors available and print the same on console..passed And Navigate to Customer questions & answers and list top 3 questions and answers..passed And Add the item to the cart, put assertion on the product added to cart....passed When Navigate to Shopping Cart button, increase the order Quantity to.......passed Then Verify the item quantity inside the cart and list the total amount for the order..passed
